english.segment1: I look into the great expanse. Your majesty is shown. Rainbow skies, sparkling ice. Beneath Your sapphire throne
english.segment2: I wash my hands. You wash my heart. Renew my innocence. I close my eyes. You see inside. Transparent as the ice
english.segment3: I fall into your blinding light. YouÂ’ve opened up my eyes. Crystal tears, visions clear. Your glory touch the sun
english.segment4: Angelic sounds. Fill the air. Surrounding me. Everywhere.
